extendedInfo.description: Listen to 2,800 classic audiobooks totally free.Easily stream or download the books.  Perfect for your commute, relaxing at home, in bed, or while at the gym.The app keeps your place for you with automatic bookmarking across your whole library.UPDATED: Now also has a Sleep Timer.Bug fixes & Download Performance Boost

reviews.title: This app has made my life SO much easier!
reviews.comment: We homeschool and utilize Librivox\'s library extensively, so this app has been a lifesaver for me.  I\'d really love to have a way to organize my books into different folders, though.  That would make it perfect!  Still gave it 5 stars. :-D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A Godsend!
reviews.comment: This app is proving to be a wonderful item to have on my phone. The reading is clear, the player runs smoothly and is easy to use, the stories are excellent, and it\'s given me a chance to read when I can\'t carry a book.
reviews.author: Marci Hilliker

reviews.title: Surprisingly good app
reviews.comment: I have been using this app while at work and have enjoyed it. There is a large library of classics that are timeless.  The only improvement I would like is the ability to search the library while also listening or downloading.
reviews.author: SARAH COLE

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I love this app and the classic books it provides. The voices are also soothing and clear. I only wish it would save your place upon exiting and allow us to follow words but otherwise great
reviews.author: Suzette Darien

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Biggest waste of time ever.  Great book selection but hard to get them to play then skips half the chapter or skips several chapters. Doesn t save your place upon exiting...etc. complete failure. Uninstall
reviews.author: Brad Waldon

reviews.title: Library needs update...
reviews.comment: Library filters and connection to LibriVox content is Audiobooks\' best feature but there many more titles available on the LibriVox website. However the web site\'s search engine is not as easy to use as the Audiobooks filters.  What I\'d like to see is Audiobooks\' library become a real time filter and search engine for the LibriVox website catalog to include all the latest titles available.  BTW  I use Audiobooks to download LibriVox files and use Mort Player.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works okay...
reviews.comment: This app is really good, with lots of wonderful stories. But the narrator\'s speaking is not that good. I understand that being a recording, but if only we could choose the narrator speaking in each story. Also, it sometimes force closes in my Samsung Galaxy Pocket. And, I really hope that it could run in background, because it does not in my phone. Please fix this as soon as possible so that I may recommend this to everyone and rate 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: I have never had any problems with this app.the app comes with free books. I wish they had some recently published books.   Your app is right on the spot ty for hours of listening.
reviews.author: Laura Hoshaw

reviews.title: excellent app for book lovers
reviews.comment: This is one of the xlent app for reading...or is it listening...books. This app got lots of books on their site so one should have unlimited internet data plans to listen and download. Stories are categorised very nicely in to various genres. Readers voices are also very good. Over all this is a very good app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: American English
reviews.comment: Ease if use - 4 Stars, Choise of books - 4; Languages - 1 Star ( no clear devision of American English and British English)  So I will give only 3 stars as Average eating.
reviews.author: Fred Bloggs

reviews.title: Worse now
reviews.comment: After the update I cannot download books from the database, prefered it before the recent changes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app.
reviews.comment: If you like books, this is a must. There are so many books to choose from, covering all genres.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: this is a fantastic application I use it for study and also I just love listening to most of the books at work during boring days I would highly recommend this application
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just needs bookmark ability
reviews.comment: LibriVox Audio Books app is better though since it has bookmarks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: 4 stars because i would like to be able to bookmark my favorite books.
reviews.author: Leo P

reviews.title: This is good.
reviews.comment: How do you delete books when your done? Also the thing about not remembering chapter is a pain.
reviews.author: kevin dorey

reviews.title: Highly recommended, best one
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app for quite some time now, it sometimes pauses when I go to other apps and it doesn\'t always remember when I last stop hearing, but overall a great one!
reviews.author: Chen Friedman

reviews.title: Thumbs down
reviews.comment: Was a great app but now it hardly works, the books skip mutiple chapters and the developers don\'t reply to emails about their app anymore
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great application.
reviews.comment: Love this app. Could you guys add an widget? Also make it automatically book mark? Anyways this great app and I\'m glad I found it! Thanks!
reviews.author: Tommy Donald

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work at all
reviews.comment: Audiobooks, albeit its wide selection of free classic books, refuses to work on android. When I chose the book and clicked play the screen just hanged there for a very long time and nothing loads. Please fix this. Thanks in advance.
reviews.author: Charisse Gelato
